category: Components of a Traditional Sailing Ship
explanation: Mast, Sail, Rudder, and Keel are all essential components of a traditional sailing ship, enabling it to harness wind power and navigate. A Propeller is a mechanical propulsion device, typically found on motor vessels, not traditional sailing ships.

Marie Curie, Pierre Curie, Ernest Rutherford, and Henri Becquerel were all pivotal figures in the discovery and study of radioactivity. Isaac Newton was a monumental figure in physics and mathematics, but his groundbreaking work was not directly related to radioactivity.

category: Words related to the sense of hearing
explanation: Echo, Reverberate, Resonate, and Audible all describe phenomena or properties related to sound or the ability to hear. Tangible, in contrast, refers to something that can be perceived by the sense of touch.
